Legislative History of Laws

DC CODE ยง 2-218.55

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, a regional governmental entity shall be exempt from the requirements of this subchapter to the extent that the requirements of this subchapter impact on the regional governmental entity's operations within the territory of a member government other than the District.

The District of Columbia Water and Sewer Authority shall be exempt from the requirements of this subchapter to the extent that the requirements of this subchapter are contrary to procurement regulations promulgated pursuant to statutes establishing the District of Columbia Water and Sewer Authority.

subchapter.text: Small, Local, and Disadvantaged Business Enterprise Development and Assistance.
